page.description: Defines the PDF to display when embedded into a UX Component.

discussion.p: The *[ui:PDF Document Properties]* define what PDF file to show. These options are only available if the Embedded Object Properties [Object type] is set to "PDF Document".

description.p: Specify the PDF document filename. The PDF document must be in a folder in the current Web Project.

section.title: PDF open parameters

description.p: Specify how you want the PDF to be displayed in the PDF reader when it is opened.

section.warning: Not all PDF readers support open parameters.

link.link: ux control properties embedded object properties object type
